cn.edu.uestc.acmicpc.db.dao.iface

Interface Dao<E extends java.io.Serializable>

  • Type Parameters:
    E - entity type
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ArticleDao, CodeDao, CompileInfoDao, ContestDao, ContestProblemDao, ContestTeamDao, ContestUserDao, DepartmentDao, LanguageDao, MessageDao, ProblemDao, ProblemTagDao, SettingDao, StatusDao, TagDao, TeamDao, TeamUserDao, TrainingContestDao, TrainingDao, TrainingPlatformInfoDao, TrainingUserDao, UserDao, UserSerialKeyDao
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArticleDaoImpl, CodeDaoImpl, CompileInfoDaoImpl, ContestDaoImpl, ContestProblemDaoImpl, ContestTeamDaoImpl, ContestUserDaoImpl, DaoImpl, DepartmentDaoImpl, LanguageDaoImpl, MessageDaoImpl, ProblemDaoImpl, ProblemTagDaoImpl, SettingDaoImpl, StatusDaoImpl, TagDaoImpl, TeamDaoImpl, TeamUserDaoImpl, TrainingContestDaoImpl, TrainingDaoImpl, TrainingPlatformInfoDaoImpl, TrainingUserDaoImpl, UserDaoImpl, UserSerialKeyDaoImpl

    public interface Dao<E extends java.io.Serializable>
    Global DAO interface.
